member.name: T:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.InfluxDbOptions
member.summary: Provides programmatic configuration for InfluxDB in the App Metrics framework.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.InfluxDbOptions.Consistenency
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of InfluxDB notes that must confirm the write

member.name: P:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.InfluxDbOptions.Endpoint
member.summary: Gets formatted endpoint for writes to InfluxDB

member.name: P:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.InfluxDbOptions.BaseUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the base URI of the InfluxDB API.
member.value: The base URI of the InfluxDB API where metrics are flushed.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.InfluxDbOptions.Database
member.summary: Gets or sets the InfluxDB database name used to report metrics.
member.value: The InfluxDB database name where metrics are flushed.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.InfluxDbOptions.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the InfluxDB database password.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.InfluxDbOptions.RetensionPolicy
member.summary: Gets or sets the InfluxDB database's retention policy to target.
member.value: The InfluxDB database's retention policy to target.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.InfluxDbOptions.UserName
member.summary: Gets or sets the InfluxDB database username.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.InfluxDbOptions.CreateDataBaseIfNotExists
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to attempt to create the specified database if it does not exist
member.value: The flag indicating whether or not to create the specifried database if it does not exist

member.name: P:App.Metrics.Reporting.InfluxDB.MetricsReportingInfluxDbOptions.FlushInterval
